snippet: Montreal gave away one goal, and then Tampa Bay’s Nate Thompson scored the winner in overtime. Ben Bishop made 28 saves for the Lightning.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Tampa Bay Lightning beat Montreal Canadiens, 2-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Montreal gave away one goal, and then Tampa Bay’s Nate Thompson scored the winner in overtime. Ben Bishop made 28 saves for the Lightning.

headline.main: A Tip and Extra Time Help Tampa Bay Edge Montreal
headline.print_headline: A Tip and Extra Time Help Tampa Bay Edge Montreal
